info.name: Dark theme for starcitizen.tools
info.description:
Dark theme for starcitizen.tools

Please update regularly for adaptations on the developing CSS.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 13/09/2016: Broken links are now shown in red.
Update 14/09/2016: Added table borders and footer color.
Update 15/09/2016: Time colors are now dark and navbar scroll is hidden.
Update 16/09/2016: New dark version for css updates.
Update 18/09/2016: Logos can now be transparant.
